body_html:
@martinwicke, @ilblackdragon - I have fixed all the bugs due to which some tests were failing. I also want to emphasise that this PR also adds support for different input signatures for ModeKeys.TRAIN and ModeKeys.EVAL and nicely extends it to ModeKeys.INFER.

As such, even if DataFeeders are going away ( and rightly so), this PR still adds necessary support which makes already awesome contrib.learn even better.

Can you please review this soon? Many thanks.
